TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable PeerContact extends System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer implements class System.IEquatable`1<class System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Class PeerContact Inherits Peer Implements IEquatable(Of PeerContact), ISerializable
type PeerContact = class inherit Peer interface IEquatable<PeerContact> interface ISerializable

summary.span: 表示用户已检索其扩展信息的对等方。

span.span: Represents a peer for which a user has retrieved extended information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 联系人表示受信任的对等方。A contact represents a trusted peer. 必须为远程对等方创建一个对象，或者， 如果该对象不在 "网络邻居" 范围内，则为该用户与远程对等方协作。A object must be created for a remote peer or for a user to collaborate with the remote peer when it is outside of the "People Near Me" scope. 对象可以作为远程计算机上运行的应用程序或远程计算机的用户存在。A object can exist as either an application running on a remote computer, or the user of a remote computer. 此类的实例可以添加到，后者以 持久方式存储联系人信息。An instance of this class can be added to the which stores the contact information in a persistent manner. 的应用程序邀请 已进行身份验证和加密。An application invitation from a is both authenticated and encrypted. 用于接受或拒绝对等联系人邀请的 UI 对话框也指示邀请者是受信任的。The UI dialog to accept or reject an invitation from a peer contact also indicates that the inviter is trusted. 订阅 对象意味着远程对等机可以查看其已注册的应用程序、对象和状态信息。Subscribing to a object means a remote peer can see its registered applications, objects and presence information. 若要订阅 ，调用方必须通过 WINDOWS UI 登录到对等方协作基础结构 或登录。To subscribe to a , the caller must be signed in to the peer collaboration infrastructure via or signed in via the Windows UI. 所有其他操作都不需要登录。All other operations do not require sign-in.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示名称可用于 在中 可能有多个电子邮件地址，或者有多个具有相同显示名称的对等方的中区分联系人。A display name may be used to differentiate contacts in a in instances where a may have multiple email addresses, or if there are multiple peers with the same display name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 离开协作会话时，不再需要某些对象。When a leaves a collaboration session, certain objects are no longer required. 如果此联系人已与其他任何终结点合作，而该终结点不是直接向对等主机注册的) (，则宿主必须在应用程序中或在处理此对象之前在应用程序中注册这些终结点 。If this contact had been collaborating with any other endpoint(s) not directly registered with the peer host, and the host expects to continue to collaborate with them, the host must register those endpoints within an application or within its before disposing of this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 作为参数传递的字符串应从获取 。The string to pass as the parameter should be obtained from . 此类旨在作为简单 XML 对象模型的轻型实现，以便在协作基础结构中使用，而不是用作常规 XML 对象模型。This class is intended to be a lightweight implementation of a simple XML object model for use within the collaboration infrastructure, and not for use as a general XML object model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果调用对等方未订阅与指定的关联的，则 必须在 调用此方法之前调用此方法。If the calling peer is not subscribed to the associated with the specified the method must be called prior to calling this method. 虽然调用方不需要登录到协作基础结构即可成功完成此方法，但在 调用方之前，必须已完成对或其中一种方法的成功调用 。While the caller is not required to sign-in to the collaboration infrastructure for this method to complete successfully, a successful call to or one of the methods must have been completed while the caller was previously signed in. 此功能仅在类上公开 。This functionality is only exposed on the class. 出于安全原因，不会在任何其他类型的对等方上公开此功能。This functionality is not exposed on any other type of peer for security reasons.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果调用对等方未订阅与指定的关联的，则 必须在 调用此方法之前调用此方法。If the calling peer is not subscribed to the associated with the specified the method must be called prior to calling this method. 虽然调用方不需要登录到协作基础结构即可成功完成此方法，但在 调用方之前，必须已完成对或其中一种方法的成功调用 。While the caller is not required to sign-in to the collaboration infrastructure for this method to complete successfully, a successful call to or one of the methods must have been completed while the caller was previously signed in.

- The calling peer is not subscribed to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方不需要登录到 基础结构即可成功完成此方法。The caller is not required to sign-in to the infrastructure for this method to complete successfully. 来自被邀请者的是与 接受邀请进行协作的被邀请者不同。A from the invitee is not the same as the invitee accepting the invitation to collaborate. 如果向未安装应用程序的远程对等方发送邀请，将自动拒绝邀请。If an invitation is sent to a remote peer that has not installed the application, the invitation is automatically declined.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsSubscribed As Boolean
public: property bool IsSubscribed { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定当前 是已订阅终结点，还是已取消对终结点的订阅。

span.span: Gets or sets a value specifying whether the current is subscribed or unsubscribed to an endpoint.

summary.span: 此属性还会获取或设置另一个值，该值指定当前对等主机或宿主应用程序是已订阅此 ，还是已取消对它的订阅。

span.span: Alternatively, this property gets or sets a value specifying whether the current peer host or hosting application has subscribed or unsubscribed to this .

value.span: 如果此 已订阅此终结点，则为 ；如果联系人尚未订阅或已取消订阅，则为 。

span.span: if this is subscribed to this endpoint, if the contact has not subscribed or has unsubscribed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在许多情况下，与 对等主机不同。In many instances, a is not the same as a peer host. 对等主机在远程对等方的中有一个实例 ，关系是它们已邀请对等方进行协作。A peer host has an instance within the of the remote peer, and the relationship is that they have invited the peer to collaborate. 终结点在其自己的 "联系人管理器" 和 "对等主机" 中具有 "Me" 实例，但未指定关系。An endpoint has a "Me" instance within its own contact manager and the peer host, but the relationship is not specified. 如果对等主机在中 ，并且对等联系人选择不选择 ，则其 值可以为 "已阻止"，而不是从主机联系人管理器中删除其条目。If the peer host is in the , and the peer contact chooses not to , its can have a value of blocked, rather than deleting its entry from the host Contact Manager. 本地对等方、远程对等主机和订阅之间存在多对多的关系。There is a many-to-many relationship between local peers, remote peers, peer hosts, and subscriptions. 订阅是每个用户，而不是每个进程、每个应用程序或每个域。Subscriptions are per user, rather than per process, per application, or per domain. 因此，与某个对象相关联的订阅 是它所订阅的联系人列表，并需要更新。Consequently, the subscriptions associated with a object are the list of contacts to which it has subscribed and from which it expects updates. 这些联系人要么已更新自己的应用程序、对象和状态信息，要么已更新有关中的联系人的信息 。Those contacts either have updated their own application, object, and presence information, or they have updated information regarding contacts in the . `true`如果对象是 表示本地或 "Me" 联系人的，则此属性始终返回，因为联系人始终订阅其自身。This property always returns `true` if the object is a which represents the local or "Me" contact, since a contact is always subscribed to itself.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有多个具有相同显示名称的对等方，则别名可以用于对象。A Nickname can be used for a object in case there are multiple peers with the same display name. 协作会话还可以使用昵称来指定经常用于较大协作工作的远程对等方。A collaboration session can also use the nickname to designate remote peers commonly used in larger collaboration efforts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当应用程序在协作基础结构中启动、注册或取消注册时，将发生应用程序更改。Application changes occur when an application is launched, registered or unregistered from the collaboration infrastructure. 当对等节点加入或离开协作会话或更改网络终结点位置时，它们也会发生。They also occur when peers join or leave a collaboration session or change network endpoint locations. 对等范围更改也可能会影响应用程序的更改。Peer scope changes may also effect a change in an application. 从此类继承的类可以重写此方法，以便在事件发生时执行其他任务。Classes that inherit from this class can override this method to perform additional tasks when the event occurs.

para.span: 在派生类中，请务必调用此方法的基类实现，以便已注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: In a derived class, be sure to call the base class implementation of this method so that registered delegates receive the event.
